item.description:
This is a two-day event with various speakers discussing all aspects of the Liberty movement. There is a charge for this event, please see the website for costs.

http://www.nheld.com/...

There are currently 26 scheduled speakers, including Dr. Katherine Albrecht, Jim Babka, Jim Gilchrist, Michael Cristofaro and Campaign for Liberty's CT state coordinator Jim Azzola.

Topics will range from home schooling, RFID, property rights, health care, 2nd amendment, religious freedom, voting rights, freedom of the press, etc.

Please see the main site for complete bios and scheduling.

Registration Form
http://www.nheld.com/....

Schedule
http://www.nheld.com/....
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the tall skinny guy with the curly hair and glasses.
item.name: The CT Liberty Forum Sept 27th - 28th
